
# Twenty Fifteen

A clean, responsive, blog-focused theme based on the default WordPress theme
of the same name.


## Config

This theme will display the following attributes from the site's `config.py`
file in its header:

* `title`
* `description`


## Includes

This theme supports the following include files:

* `menu`
* `sidebar`
* `footer`
